name: Purchasing Platform
tag_list: purchasing, procurement, real-estate, marketplace, platform, ecommerce
overview:
Purchasing Platform provides a centralized marketplace for real estate operators to purchase anything needed to effectively manage their assets.

The company is a membership based, third-party procurement company specializing in the real estate industry. With a focus on price, product quality, ease of use and customer service, Purchasing Platform offers an ideal solution for any real estate operator.

Purchasing Platform provides a secure, centralized marketplace for property operators to purchase anything needed to effectively manage their assets. They will not overwhelm their property managers with countless repetitive products. They continually research and evaluate the best products in each category, while offering them at significant discounts.

Purchasing Platform understands how their clients operate, The website is designed to engage all levels of a client’s organizational structure during the purchasing process. They have built-in functionality allowing a client to customize its organizational structure, order approval hierarchy and spending limits.

The underlining objective at Purchasing Platform is providing extremely attractive and transparent pricing on their products and services. They continually evaluate their partner pricing and relationships to ensure their members have access to the best offerings. Their platform service fees are proudly displayed separately from their products with 100% transparency.
